name: cloudbeaver
description: CloudBeaver is a lightweight self-hosted cloud database manager built by the DBeaver team. It offers an intuitive web UI for viewing, editing, and managing databases, including PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Oracle.
features: Database Manager: Web-based database management tool. Browser access.
Multi-Database: Support for PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, and more. Universal compatibility.
Intuitive UI: Clean interface for viewing and editing data. Easy management.
DBeaver Team: Built by trusted DBeaver developers. Proven expertise.
Query Editor: Write and execute SQL queries. Powerful functionality.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage for efficient operation. Fast performance.
Self-Hosted: Keep database access on your infrastructure. Security control.
